Quick search

calmodels¶

This module contains functionality to get calibrator models. It is used by the crosscal module.

Reference¶

apercal.subs.calmodels.get_calparameters(calibrator)[source]¶

calibrator(string): Calibrator name to get the values for Values are taken from Perley Butler 2017: http://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.3847/1538-4365/aa6df9/pdf Values for CTD93 from Bjorn Adebahr’s fits

return(bool, string, string, string, string): Calibrator model available, I,Q,U,V fluxes, parametric model coefficients, reference frequency, Rotation Measure
